title: _livecasino.io_
author: _livecasino.io_
content: Hello dear BitcoinTalk Community!Livecasino.io Promo for this week is for 1mBTC Evolution Blackjack Free Chip!!!Livecasino.io BitcoinTalk Promo #28 will work like this:Reward1mBTC Evolution Blackjack Free Chip!How?Opt-in by sending PM with your livecasino.io username (please use BitcoinTalk promo #28 as PM subject to facilitate the management)Wager at least 10 mBTC on any Live games on Livecasino.io, including slots!Make at least deposit during campaign periodPromo durationThis Promo will be running from the moment of this post, until Sunday 21st August 23:59 GMTRulesAll BitcoinTalk users can participateMulti accounts will not be eligible for the rewardThe reward will be credited to the livecasino.io accounts on Monday 22nd August, 17:00 GMTFree bet has 1 x wagering requirementAll bets and winnings will be withdrawable from the freebetDue to Game Providers country restrictions, some participants may have to receive a different, but equivalent, rewardNormal livecasino.io terms and conditions still apply, including multi-account restrictionsWe hope you enjoy!Fl√°vio from livecasino.io team

comments.author: Paxsells
comments.body: Quote from: Paxsells on August 16, 2022, 11:42:52 PMUsername : PxsllsUser '_livecasino.io_' has not chosen to allow messages from newbies. You should post in their relevant thread to remind them to enable this setting.So I'm not allowed to join this contest?
